item.description:
This year's convergence is not too far away!  Join fellow permies from Maine heading down to the South Shore (just south of Boston anyway!) for the 8th Annual Northeastern Permaculture Convergence.  And don't forget to register (discounts available for doing a volunteer shift).

This is a great opportunity to connect with new and experienced permaculture people from around our region.  We are blessed to have a strong and vibrant network here in the northeast US and in eastern Canada - join in!


Use the comments area below on this event page to talk about carpooling from Maine.


Various links:


http://northeastconvergence.wordpress.com/
https://twitter.com/#!/NEConvergence
http://www.facebook.com/pages/Northeastern-Permaculture-Convergence/190816097619717

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: Carpool to 8th Annual Northeastern Permaculture Convergence
